name: The Bare Escape
description:
• Two routes available to play through, each with three different ending variations. Pair up with either anxious Marcel or stoic Anzo to escape the Tower! 
  • A couple of event CGs
  • An easy point-and-click finding game (kind of) and a skippable maze puzzle
  • An ending tracker (There are 6 in total)

Planned for future versions:

  • Customized GUI (currently everything, except for the puzzles, is the default Ren'Py GUI, sorry! I ran out of time!)
  • A route for Lady Emi, the lady of the Tower where things are explained a little more...
  • Some more CGs + CG gallery
Credits

Art, writing, coding: Jen

Music: Art of Escapism 
 Licensed under Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)

I hope you enjoy this silly little game about shirtless men!
